layout.structure: Sidebar (Left, Fixed) + Header (Top, Sticky) + Main Content (Scrollable)

cards.style: rounded-xl border border-slate-200 shadow-sm bg-white hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-200
cards.metric_card: flex flex-col justify-between h-full p-6 relative overflow-hidden
cards.gradient_card: text-white bg-gradient-to-br from-indigo-600 to-purple-600 border-none shadow-lg

buttons.primary: bg-indigo-600 hover:bg-indigo-700 text-white shadow-sm rounded-lg px-4 py-2 font-medium transition-all
buttons.secondary: bg-white border border-slate-200 text-slate-700 hover:bg-slate-50 shadow-sm rounded-lg px-4 py-2 font-medium transition-all
buttons.ghost: hover:bg-slate-100 text-slate-600 hover:text-slate-900 rounded-lg px-4 py-2 transition-all
buttons.quick_action: flex flex-col items-center justify-center p-4 rounded-xl border border-slate-200 bg-white hover:border-indigo-200 hover:bg-indigo-50/50 transition-all gap-3 group

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the dashboard using the 'Bento Grid' layout strategy for the main metrics.
Use the 'Manrope' font for all headings to give a modern, friendly feel.
Apply the 'primary_gradient' (Indigo to Purple) to the 'Total Students' or main CTA cards to mimic the DigitalEdu style.
Ensure the Sidebar is dark (Slate-900) and the main content area is light (Slate-50).
Use 'Lucide React' icons for the Quick Actions grid. Make them large (w-8 h-8) and colored with the primary brand color.
The 'Recent Activities' section should use the 'students' image as a thumbnail or context image.
Ensure all interactive elements have 'data-testid' attributes.
Do NOT use default Shadcn card styles blindly; customize them with the 'rounded-xl' and 'shadow-sm' classes defined in components.
For the Attendance Chart, use a Donut chart with the defined chart colors.
Maintain the 'Tino AI' floating button/widget if it exists, ensuring it doesn't overlap with critical UI.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable.
